sentences.en: A research paper published alongside the HMIC report will infuriate Home Office ministers who have been arguing there is no direct link between falling police numbers and levels of crime.

sentences.en: Yesterday's decision will infuriate Turkey and Brazil, who will see it as the established powers quashing a genuine attempt at mediation by two new voices on the world stage.
